title: Leith Pierre

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player each night: their target is dealt a powerful attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start knowing the roles of all players.
- If you are correctly guessed as Leith Pierre by any member of the Good team, you die and lose. The choosing player wins the game and leaves the town.
- If a player chooses you while you choose them, they are dealt a powerful attack.
- If you survive until the final two players, you kill the other and win.
- Players who die due to you will instead go missing instead of revealing the cause of death.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game.
